item.title: Mentioned by GlobalNews.ca
item.description:
Ottawa punts request for cost of Super Bowl ads
OTTAWA – The federal government has turfed a request for details about how much money it spent advertising its economic action plan during this year's Super Bowl. Last month, NDP MP Mathieu Ravignat asked the government to disclose the costs of the ...

item.description:
Tories mull hardware agency
"It's not a bad idea in the sense that it can potentially be cost-effective," said NDP Treasury Board critic Mathieu Ravignat. "The problem is this was in the last budget and we've seen few steps forward. We don't want it to cost more than the savings it's going to ...

item.description:
